Name: Toy - Rainbow Fireworks
Description:
Summon a rainbow firework in front of you.
Approach and tap the button to set off the firework.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description$english:
Summon a rainbow firework in front of you.
Approach and tap the button to set off the firework.
Summoned toy lasts 10 minutes.
Description2$english:
Toy Usage Restrictions:
1. Toy summoning is limited per area. Try switching to another if you've reached the max.
2. Toy count is also limited near each character. Please summon in a more open area if needed.
